option.name: template
option.value: public ## #if($field.modifierStatic) static ## #end $field.type ## #set($name = $StringUtil.capitalizeWithJavaBeanConvention($StringUtil.sanitizeJavaIdentifier($helper.getPropertyName($field, $project)))) #if ($field.boolean && $field.primitive) #if ($StringUtil.startsWithIgnoreCase($name, 'is')) #set($name = $StringUtil.decapitalize($name)) #else is## #end #else get## #end ${name}() { return this.$field.name; }
